title: Receive no accounts while using accounts-keyword in migration-script

body:
The networks object is the second argument passed to migration functions. The third argument is the accounts. So you would do: 
```
module.exports = (deployer, networks, accounts) => {
  ...the rest of your migration...
```
See the docs for more info --> https://truffleframework.com/docs/truffle/getting-started/running-migrations#available-accounts
